Name: Whiskycaf√© L&B
Review Text: Best place for whisky in Amsterdam by far! Explore their whisky menus or ask for the book to browse their extensive selection. Very cozy small bar, always check through both entrance doors if they might have a spot for you somewhere. There's no seating upstairs, just the bathrooms.
